title: Could Someone Gift me Spirit Guard Udyr
body:
I am not that well of on money as I am a student and was wondering if anyone would be able to gift me Spirit Guard Udyr? <3. 
Perks of doing it:
Eternal Love and gratitude.
Will make sure your always looked after now and into the future
Will go into a heavily populated area and start telling people how good you are.
Did I mention I would love you forever.{{champion:77}}

replies.body: For fucks sake just go do your damn chores and stop pretending like Oceania cares.

Look at the icon. Hue. Hue.
Got it from a mystery skin XD
